item.description:
Start the New Year with forró dancing and some Portuguese conversation in a fun and friendly environment.

Join us for the class or come later to listen to and/or dance to a live Brazilian band.

Class starts just after 8:30pm and runs til about 10pm. It's $10 cash and you can drop in at any time.

Live band starts around 10:30pm.

As always Portuguese conversation is encouraged but not mandatory.

Once I have a better idea of how many people will attend, I will post info on seating arrangements.

Hope to see you there!

Brazilian cuisine is available on the premises.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be sitting in the bar area, to your right as you enter the building. More details to follow.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Brazilian style forró dancing
